## Bio

Peiyu Chen is a second-year MHS student in Cardiovascular and Clinical Epidemiology and a registered dietitian. Her research interests Include nutritional epidemiology and chronic diseases. Her thesis project investigates the association between dietary protein intake and incidence of dementia in ARIC study.
